content: to end round 2 *s1yo brp* repeat to end round 7 *slip brk k2tog p and brk psso s1yo* repeat to end 28sts decreased 28sts brioche pattern repeat remaining round 3 *brk s1yo* repeat to end round 8 *s1yo brp* repeat to end round 4 *s1yo brp* repeat to end round 9 *k2tog* repeat to end 14sts note 2 rounds of brioche looks like 1 round if decreased 14sts remaining looking at the stitches as a guide round 10 k to end mc version only finishing repeat rounds 3&4 until you have worked 120 rounds or until hat measures about pull remaining sts tight and weave yarn 25 5cm/10 long then continue from through these sts twice using tapestry needle decreases section below and secure weave in ends and block gently gradient version only pompom repeating rounds 3&4 work 30 row total in make a big pompom with all your remaining cc1 then join cc2 and work the following yarn leave a long tail on your pompom for colour change pattern securing to the top of the hat using a tapestry needle ©helena timms 2022
